description: JSON Schema for unnormalized_address class in Elephant Lexicon

county_jurisdiction.description: The name of the county or local jurisdiction that has authority over the property for tax assessment and administrative purposes. Should not include the word 'County' in the value.

full_address.description: The street address of the property including street number, street name, city, and state and postal code. Format: '123 Main, Springfield, IL' or '456 Oak Ave, Chicago, IL 1003'.

latitude.description: Latitude is a coordinate that specifies the north-south position of a point on the Earth's surface. It is an angular measurement, usually expressed in degrees, with values ranging from -90째 at the South Pole to +90째 at the North Pole.

longitude.description: Longitude is a coordinate that specifies the east-west position of a point on the Earth's surface. It is an angular measurement, usually expressed in degrees, with values ranging from -180째 to +180째.
